sections.general: hr associate professional summary enthusiastic and goal-oriented hr professional with 3+ years experience driving innovation and strategy for a global technology organization. excellent reputation for proactively resolving problems, communicating effectively, and driving overall operational improvements. relocating to the san francisco bay area and seeking a fulltime role in human resources or talent acquisition where i can leverage my experience and provide value to the company.
